pageContext.claim: “Tim Scott and I and others have worked so hard on Opportunity Zones. They're really working, far greater than anyone thought, including me. People are coming in, they're investing large amounts of money in places that they would have never invested before -- inner-city locations and others.”
pageContext.analysis: The impact of the Opportunity Zones is not yet clear, according to the Tax Foundation. This is in part because key data collection requirements that would be needed to assess the progress were stripped from the final version of the bill.
